<title level="1" right="Rules">[Will Save](/Rules.aspx?ID=1091)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 88</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Since they have their own minds, intelligent items might be subject to mental effects that require a Will save.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
